notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: Ahmad Al-Jumaili fabricated the material, obtained thin film characteristics, interpreted and analyzed the data and wrote the manuscript. Avishek Kumar assisted in the AFM and ICP measurements. Peter Mulvey and Jeff Warner helped in designing and performing the antibacterial experiments, and analyzed the acquired CSLM images. Kateryna Bazaka directed the research and assisted in the interpretation of the results of this manuscript. Mohan V. Jacob coordinated and guided the overall preparation of the manuscript. All authors discussed the results and edited the manuscript.
